name: Medieval Gauntlets
description: This pair of fully-articulated metal gauntlets has extended cuffs to cover the forearm. The cuff is decorated with ridges. The gauntlets are made from 1 mm steel, with steel rivets. The glove is a split leather and the cuff is 2,5-3 mm vegetable tanned grain leather. The glove is glued, stitched and riveted to the plates making this gauntlet very durable....

name: Scouts Gauntlets
description: This pair of awesome Scouts Gauntlets is a perfect means of hand protection for the light armored warrior. Made from mild steel the grant the wearer a full range of hand movement.

name: Hourglass Gauntlets, Green
description: This awesome pair of green hourglass gauntlets give you a snug fit as is the blacksmith fitted then especially for you. Decorated with brass plates over the knuckles and sewn to the leather glove it will protect the hands of any knight during hash Larp battles.

name: Rondel, Dark
description: If you find that your hands are not adequately protected, then consider these dark rondels. These finger bucklers provide additional protection the hand and can be worn over finger gauntlets as added protection. You will feel the need to charge into battle wearing this elegant looking, historically accurate hand protection.

name: Rondel, Polished Steel
description: The rondel hand protection is the perfect piece of armor and can be worn with almost any weapon. This pair of metal plates help protect the hand from scrapes and can be worn with finger gauntlets as added protection. Made like a small buckler they are a great companion piece and are period accurate.

name: Hourglass Gauntlets, Black
description: This pair of Black Hourglass Gauntlets are re made mild steel gloves covered in black suede leather and is designed to protect the hand during Larp combat without compromising maneuverability. Adorned with brass trim it is impressive and comfortable to wear on and off the battlefield.

name: Hourglass Gauntlets, Red
description: Our Red Hourglass Gauntlets are a set of mild steel gloves covers in red suede leather and is designed to protect the hand during Larp combat without compromising maneuverability. Let the battle begin!

name: Hourglass Demi Gauntlets, Dark
description: Demi-Gauntlets are ideal for Larp combats. They provide the proper protection, are light weight and give unrestricted movement to the hand.  This type of gauntlet is useful to larpers whose character need their fingers free for looting.

name: Hourglass Demi Gauntlets
description: Demi-Gauntlets are ideal for Larp combats. They provide the proper protection, are light weight and give unrestricted movement to the hand.  This type of gauntlet is useful to larpers whose character need their fingers free for looting.

name: Ratio Gauntlets
description: Inspired from eastern armor and combining plate with fine quality leather, this pair of Ratio Gauntlets combines form and function creating epic beauty. Rich in detail and highlighted with leather trim and antique brass finishes, this set echo greatness while providing protection.

name: Undead Medieval Gauntlets
description: The armies of the damned need to protect their joints as well so why not with this pair of undead gauntlets complete with inner glove and has articulated plates. Each individual plate is riveted to a leather strip then hand stitched to the glove preventing any movement of the plates. Fits almost anyone.

name: Black Ice Gauntlets
description: Fantasy inspired Black ice larp gauntlets, comes complete with inner glove and has articulated plates.  The unique feature of this fantasy gauntlet is the large plate that covers the front fist as a sort of brass knuckle after which a series of laminated plates are fixed....

name: Medieval Gauntlets, Defective
description: The gloves on these gauntlets need to be resewn or replaced, so in an effort to salvage them we are offering a large rebate. LIMITED QUANTITY!
